name: LUCID
summary: Storynet (Subnet 92, LUCID) is a decentralized AI-powered network on Bittensor focused on generating high-quality, interactive narratives for games, novels, and immersive experiences. Utilizing a four-stage pipeline—blueprint, characters, story arc, and chapters—Storynet enables both creators and developers to produce structured, choice-driven stories via a standard API. Miners contribute compute power to generate stories and are rewarded in $TAO based on a meritocratic, multi-dimensional scoring system that evaluates technical quality, structure, content, and narrative creativity. Anti-cheating mechanisms, including plagiarism detection and originality scoring, ensure content integrity and fairness within the network.
